name: Treasure Of The Deep (kunrex)
description:
This game was made for Ludam Dare 48 in 3 days.

 Treasure of the deep is a single player game for MacOSX and Windows. 

You are a famous explorer, who has heard myths and legends about an ancient treasure that had sunk into the depths of the ocean a long time back. Many have ventured to find this treasure, but none have returned. 

You decide to set out on your own, but as you travel deeper you see other creatures that time forgot... will you make it out alive?
